name: Metalware
long_description:
Metalware develops advanced firmware security solutions for real-time embedded systems, protecting critical industries like aerospace, automotive, industrial control, telecom, medical devices, and IoT from cyber threats. With our roots from SpaceX, L3Harris, Amazon Robotics, and JHU APL, we are deeply mission-driven and bring cutting edge firmware and cybersecurity expertise to the table.
‍
Our product is an automated, intelligent binary fuzzer that enables organizations to efficiently discover and remediate security weaknesses in embedded software before release or deployment.
‍
Metalware’s mission is to protect the foundation of modern technology by providing cutting-edge firmware security tools that safeguard embedded systems from cyber threats, zero-day vulnerabilities, and supply chain risks across critical industries.
